explains: n. 来者，来的人；有成功希望的人
wordGroup: all comers 全体来人；前来(申请参加…)的人 , 全体前来的人；全体愿意参加的人

sentences.en: The first comer was the sultan himself.
sentences.cn: 第一位来人是苏丹本人。

sentences.en: She was close behind it when she turned the comer, but the Rabbit was no longer to be seen.
sentences.cn: 当她在兔子后面拐弯的时候，已经很靠近了，但兔子已经不见了。

sentences.en: In the other comer is the world's most valuable company, whose chief executive, Timothy Cook, has said he will appeal the court's order.
sentences.cn: 另一方是世界上市值最高的公司，其首席执行官蒂莫西·库克表示，他将对法院的判决提出上诉。
